attributes.action: Ignore the call for a second referendum on leaving the EU.
attributes.additional_details:
Typical local/general election turnout sits around the 40-45% mark. 

The EU referendum drew an unprecedented 72-73% turnout.. The nation has spoken louder than ever before. There is no need for a second referendum!
attributes.background: We the undersigned call upon HM Government to ignore the 60%/75% rule calling for a second referendum.
